mainBlog.title: Invisible Talking Camera Using Python
mainBlog.excerpt:
The Invisible talking camera uses Python OpenCV and pyttsx library in order to calibrate your background based on HSL thresholding.
It then performs bit wise operations background subtraction along with minor Gaussian Bluring and smoothening and segmentation to make you invisible in the frame!
PyTTS is used to talk with your program to give basic inputs like initiating calibration, varying thresholds etc.
